src:
Tak Cuma Maluku, Monopoli Tol Laut Juga Terjadi di Daerah Ini
01 Nov 2019, 08:15 by Anisa Indraini


Ilustrasi/Foto: Muhammad Idris

Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) menyebut ada pihak swasta yang menguasai barang yang dikirim menggunakan Tol Laut di Indonesia. Hal ini disebut akan mempengaruhi program tol laut dan mengganggu harga di wilayah terluar.Direktur Lalu Lintas dan Angkutan Laut Kementerian Perhubungan Wisnu Handoko mengungkapkan monopoli terjadi di trayek tol laut pada daerah Timur, seperti Maluku dan Papua. "Rata-rata terjadi di Maluku, Papua, daerah Timur. Paling banyak di situ," kata Wisnu di Kementerian Perhubungan, Jakarta Pusat, Jumat (1/11/2019).Wisnu menyebut, ada empat daerah yang barang-barangnya dimonopoli lewat program Tol Laut, yaitu Namlea, Saumlaki, Dobo, hingga Wasior. Hal itu terjadi lantaran pengiriman barang paling besar terjadi di sana."Di sana pengirimannya memang paling besar. Kan trayek paling banyak kesana dibandingkan dengan yang ke Sulawesi, Natuna, ya kan," imbuhnya.Lebih lanjut, Wisnu menyebut pihaknya sudah mengetahui perusahaan yang melakukan monopoli. Namun, ia belum mau menyebutkan perusahaan yang dimaksud."Perusahaan yang monopoli sudah diketahui. Nanti akan kita sampaikan," imbuhnya. Simak Video "Jokowi Sebut Ada Pihak Swasta Nakal Main-main di Tol Laut"[Gambas:Video 20detik](ara/ara)
text:
Not Only Maluku, Sea Toll Monopoly Also Occurs in This Area
01 Nov 2019, 08:15 by Anisa Indraini


Illustration / Photo: Muhammad Idris

Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) said there are private parties who control the goods that are sent using the Sea Toll in Indonesia. This is said to affect the sea toll program and disrupt prices in the outermost regions. The Transportation and Sea Transportation Director of the Ministry of Transportation, Wisnu Handoko, revealed that monopolies occur in sea highway routes in eastern regions, such as Maluku and Papua. "On average it occurs in Maluku, Papua, and the East. Most are there," Wisnu said at the Ministry of Transportation, Central Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019). Wisnu said, there were four regions whose goods were monopolized through the program Sea Toll, namely Namlea, Saumlaki, Dobo, to Wasior. That happened because the biggest shipment of goods took place there. "There the shipments were indeed the biggest. The routes were the most there compared to the ones to Sulawesi, Natuna, right," he added. Furthermore, Wisnu said his party already knew of the companies that carried out the monopoly. However, he did not want to mention the company in question. "The monopoly company is known. We will convey later," he added. Check out the video "Jokowi Call There Are Naughty Private Parties Playing in the Sea Toll" [Gambas: Video 20seconds] (fig / fig)
